solidbase.core
Class SQLFile

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.core.SQLFile

public class SQLFile
extends Object

This class manages an SQL file's contents. It detects the encoding and reads commands from it.

Since:
Apr 2010
Author:
René M. de Bloois
